column1: #text=I walked onto the plane and was greeted by the stewardess who had a very kind smile .
#text=I walked slowly behind the other passengers as people were shoving their luggage into the overhead compartments .
#text=I found my seat just ahead of the right wing .
#text=I buckled into my seat next to the window , and prepared myself for takeoff .
#text=The stewardess explained all the pre-flight information about safety .
#text=The plane started to taxi to the runway .
#text=My stomach started to get a little twisted .
#text=The engines started to roar and the passengers were pushed back into their seats .
#text=In a few seconds the plane started climbing and we were off .
#text=I watched the the trees and the buildings get smaller and smaller .
#text=After a few minutes we started to level off and everything on the ground looked miniature .
#text=We were above the clouds for most of the flight , but I still love looking out the window .
#text=As we began our descent , we went through rain clouds and it was a bit bumpy , but we landed safely and exited the plane the same way we began , slow and without efficiency .
